long_description: The Oakley Tucker insulated jacket serves up windproof and waterproof protection and warmth for winter fun in the backcountry or on the back deck of the lodge. Waterproof, breathable laminated shell with the critical seams taped keeps you warm and dry in inclement weather. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. 80g Thinsulate(R) insulation in the body and 60g in the hood and sleeves prevent winter weather from chilling you to the bone. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth; powder skirt connects to compatible Oakley pants (sold separately). Pit zippers let you vent body heat quickly. Hood detaches when you don't need it. Exterior zippered hand pockets hold your essentials; interior elastic pocket keeps a digital music player or cell phone secure. Route your headphones through the buttonhole port to listen to music while your device stays securely stowed inside the jacket. Oakley Tucker insulated jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: The Oakley Tucker insulated jacket serves up windproof and waterproof protection and warmth for winter fun in the backcountry or on the back deck of the lodge.
